abstract: The founder of UnitedHealth Group, William W. McGuire, reached a settlement with regulators over the backdating of stock options and will forfeit $418 million in options and retirement benefits.
snippet: The founder of UnitedHealth Group, William W. McGuire, reached a settlement with regulators over the backdating of stock options and will forfeit $418 million in options and retirement benefits.
lead_paragraph: In one of the largest corporate pay give-backs ever, William W. McGuire, the former chief executive of UnitedHealth Group, has agreed to forfeit at least $418 million to settle claims related to back-dated stock options.

abstract: In one of the largest corporate pay give-backs ever, William W. McGuire, the former chief executive of UnitedHealth Group, has agreed to forfeit at least $418 million to settle claims related to back-dated stock options.
lead_paragraph: In one of the largest corporate pay give-backs ever, William W. McGuire, the former chief executive of UnitedHealth Group, has agreed to forfeit at least $418 million to settle claims related to back-dated stock options.

headline.main: Ex-UnitedHealth C.E.O. to Settle Inquiry for $400 Million
